description:
Legendary weapons for original WARRIORS OROCHI officers will be added.
Enjoy the new battle experience!

■Content
Legendary Weapons for:
Gaia, Hades, Yang Jian, Ryu Hayabusa, Joan of Arc, Achilles, and Perseus

■How to use
You can change weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".

*This content is only applicable to the WARRIORS OROCHI 4 Ultimate, it cannot be used in WARRIORS OROCHI 4 base game.
name: Legendary Weapons OROCHI Pack 4
